tool.name: BWA Align
tool.description: Index sequences in the FASTA format

param.name: n
param.label: max #diff (integer) or missing prob under 0.02 err rate (float) [0.04]

param.name: o
param.label: maximum number or fraction of gap opens [1]

param.name: e
param.label: maximum number of gap extensions, -1 for disabling long gaps [-1]

param.name: i
param.label: do not put an indel within integer bp towards the ends [5]

param.name: d
param.label: maximum occurrences for extending a long deletion [10]

param.name: l
param.label: seed length [32]

param.name: k
param.label: maximum differences in the seed [2]

param.name: m
param.label: maximum entries in the queue [2000000]

param.name: t
param.label: number of threads [1]

param.name: M
param.label: mismatch penalty [3]

param.name: O
param.label: gap open penalty [11]

param.name: E
param.label: gap extension penalty [4]

param.name: R
param.label: stop searching when there are >integer equally best hits [30]

param.name: q
param.label: quality threshold for read trimming down to 35bp [0]

param.name: f
param.label: file to write output to instead of stdout

param.name: B
param.label: length of barcode

param.name: L
param.label: log-scaled gap penalty for long deletions

param.name: N
param.label: non-iterative mode: search for all n-difference hits (slooow)

param.name: I
param.label: the input is in the Illumina 1.3+ FASTQ-like format

param.name: b
param.label: the input read file is in the BAM format
use single-end reads only (effective with -b)
use the 1st read in a pair (effective with -b)
use the 2nd read in a pair (effective with -b)

param.name: Y
param.label: filter Casava-filtered sequences

param.name: prefix
param.label: Prefix

param.name: inputfile
param.label: Input file (FastQ format)
